name: DNSMasq Service
description: Checks dnsmasq daemon health and restarts it if inactive.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then if systemctl is-active dnsmasq >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then if service dnsmasq status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart dnsmasq || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service dnsmasq restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active dnsmasq >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
